basics.name: Kaicheng Yang
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am Kaicheng Yang, a third-year undergraduate student at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, currently exploring and learning in Efficient AI.

project.title: Exploration of Efficient Binarization Techniques for Diffusion Models
project.funder: National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC)
project.description: This project is supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) Undergraduate Research Funding. I was selected as one of 20 undergraduate students at Shanghai Jiao Tong University annually for this competitive grant.
